name: Interlude 1
text:
May 18th
We’ve arrived on the island. I can barely hide my excitement! Lucy and George set up our base of operations while Charlie and I searched for the 5 Trials.
It didn’t take us long to find where it was. There’s a suspicious cave that leads deep into the island. I’m surprised it's barely hidden. It’s as if it was designed to lure people inside.
